external_games.name: SD Sengoku Bushou Retsuden: Rekka no Gotoku Tenka o Nusure!

name: SD Sengoku Bushou Retsuden: Rekka no Gotoku Tenka o Nusure!
summary: SD Sengoku Bushou Retsuden: Rekka no Gotoku Tenka o Nusure! is a Strategy game, developed by Arc System Works and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1990.
